pullrequest.title: Modications to ignition launch files to accomodate for spawning custom sensor configurations of x1/x2/x3/x4 from localMode.

content.raw: LGTM!. I think the same changes need to be applied to `cloudsim_bridge.ign`and `cloudsim_sim.ign`. This made me realize that the `robotType` is determined by looking at the second character, which means if the second character in `<organization_name>` happens to be a number, the launch file will do the wrong thing. I'll create a separate PR for that.
content.html: LGTM!. I think the same changes need to be applied to cloudsim_bridge.ignand cloudsim_sim.ign. This made me realize that the robotType is determined by looking at the second character, which means if the second character in <organization_name> happens to be a number, the launch file will do the wrong thing. I'll create a separate PR for that.
